title: Вика-ураган
overview: Vika, trying to teach a drunken hooligan the mind, accidentally leaves him without an eye, for which he receives an impressive sentence. After being released, she loses literally everything she had: there is now a sex shop in her apartment, her husband goes to a friend, and her little son was diagnosed with autism and now he lives in a specialized boarding school. Finding herself on the sidelines of life and facing all the difficulties of socialization, Vika does not give up and desperately tries to cope with a hurricane of problems. To prove to everyone that the real hurricane that can make everything fly around is herself.
